title: Please change the prerequisites on getting into ranked
body: Just a thought, you know how it takes 30 levels and 16 champions to get to ranked, can u please take the game offline for a while and fix that, meaning yes making higher levels 35-40+, 50+ champions and a certain amount of wins in normal's (300+). Why im saying this is because, too many "new" people are getting to level 30 in 2 weeks, buying the 16 champions, then trying ranked out before actually knowing what its about and how to play more then a few champions, and another thing actually deal with the reports, yes i know there will be countless reports from countless of people and yes it would be a huge task but still make it 3 reports and your banned for a day sort of thing, yes i know ill get banned alot but thats when u make it 3 bans and your on perma ban. just saying cheers

level 30 in 2 weeks... WTF LOL it took me like 6 months playing 2-3 games a day or so. I think having a higher level minimum would put a lot of people off this game. Its hard enough getting 1 account to 30. Grinding that crap is sht.

There has always been this argument. Especially form people in Silver/Bronze and newer people who think they know better (since unranked accounts are roughly Silver 3 or so MMR level).

I agree there should be more prerequisite in a team game such as this to try and make sure everyone is "ranked ready" since clueless people do have a negative impact on others experience.
That being said, "normal wins" and making it harder to reach ranked level isn't really that good of an idea. I've played and won plenty of normals against trolls and being a troll myself. By troll I mean, playing stupid crap like Yasuo/Maokai bottom.

With 120+ champions, I think owning the minimum of 16 is a tad low. However with 120+ champions I think only having 6 bans is a little low too. Plenty of things to poke holes at where the game could improve slightly, but you have to think about the bigger picture and how it impacts on people.
If you increase the number of champions required, does that mean that even more people will forgo runes in order to buy champions like most new people do?

------------------------------
